sentences.sContent: This hormone is multifunctional, but one of its main tasks is to act as a neurotransmitter and regulate serotonin levels.
sentences.sContent_eng: This hormone is multifunctional, but one of its main tasks is to act as a neurotransmitter and regulate serotonin levels.
sentences.sCn: 这种激素是多功能的，但它的主要功能是作为神经递质并调节血清素含量。

trans.tranOther: having or able to perform many functions
